name: Mr. Brightman
description: Mr. Brightmanis a straycatwho can be seen at various times outsideViktor's ClinicinCyberpunk 2077. Mr. Brightman is first encountered atop the stairway leading down to Viktor's Clinic, duringV's first visit. The cat can be seen outside Viktor's clinic a second time after V leavesMisty's rooftop, before embarking on their final mission. If V pets the cat, Misty will mention that its name is Mr. Brightman, and will say "We found the poor guy in the trash behind the clinic. I think he missesJackie".
